title: Seasonable advice, for preventing the mischiefe of fire, that may come by negligence, treason, or otherwise Ordered to be printed by the Lord Major of London. And is thought very necessary to hang in every mans house, especially in these dangerous times. / Invented by William Gosling, engineer.
author: Gosling, William, engineer.
publisher: Printed for H.B. at the Castle in Corn-hill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
